title: Upcycling of plastic waste to atomic nickel sites decorated carbon for efficient electrochemical CO2 conversion
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00244J, Paper
Lan-Hui Feng, Zhi-Hui Lv, Yi-Jie Kong, Xin-Ming Hu
Excessive CO2 emission and plastic waste pollution constitute two pressing threats to our environment. Effective tactics are urgently demanded to address these issues. Here we report that the thermal treatment...
